entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Donnacona
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:44 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C

entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
